Fix CORS credentials setting for production authentication

Enable CORS_ALLOW_CREDENTIALS to allow browser to send JWT tokens
in cross-origin requests. This fixes 403 Forbidden error when
approving users in /admin/user-management on production.

- Set CORS_ALLOW_CREDENTIALS = True
- Required for JWT authentication between different domains
- Resolves: User approval failing with CORS policy error
